title: SCP-4028
content:
[[include info:start]]
**SCP-4028:** La Historia de Don Quixote de la Mancha
**Author:** [[*user the great hippo]]
**Images:** [https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Band_van_beige_kalfsleer-KONB12-857F31.jpeg Link], [https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Don_Quixote_16.jpg Link], and  [https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Three_3_prong_windmills.jpg Link].

Inspired, of course, by //[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Don_Quixote Don Quixote]//.

**Music:** [https://youtu.be/TiAz_g2-H_E Man of La Mancha] (Colm Wilkinson)

[[size 80%]]
= **Next: [[[[SCP-3546]]]]: //Doggone It, I Fold!//**
[[/size]]
----

[[include info:more]]
[[include info:end]]
